charges.charge_description: 26:7203 WILLFUL FAILURE TO FILE RETURN, SUPPLY INFORMATION-Did willfully fail to make an income tax return (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 12 months. Upon release from custody, defendant shall be on supervised release for one year. Defendant ordered to pay $151,133.00 in restitution to the IRS or such principal amount as may be adjusted by the IRS if it is later determined that taxes were less than that amount. Defendant shall make restitution payments from any wages he may earn inn prison in accordance with the Bureau of Prisons Financial Responsibility Program. Any portion of restitution that is not paid in full at the time of his release from imprisonment shall become a condition of supervised release. Restitution shall be made in monthly installments at a rate of no less than 25% of defendant's gross income over a twelve month period, to commence 30 days after the date of judgment. The $25.00 special assessment is due immediately. Defendant remanded to custody of the U S Marshal. If a notice of appeal is filed, the Clerk shall transmit the PSI under seal to Court of Appeals. (1)

charges.charge_description: 26:7203 WILLFUL FAILURE TO FILE RETURN, SUPPLY INFORMATION-Did willfully fail to make an income tax return (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on motion of Government during sentencing hearing of 12/19/97 (2)
